root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 9-5-2, translated into en
root.data:
This indicator measures the effort undertaken by full-time researchers in a given year in every 1 million inhabitants. Expresses the number of full-time equivalent researchers per 1 million inhabitants.

For example, the effort made by a number of (200) researchers and in a given year, can be equivalent to the work done by 80 professionals working full time in R&D.
